( Reuters)- Chrysler Group Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne vowed on Tuesday to keep the automaker on top of the minivan market in North America and said the company would develop a new type of minivan by 2014. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made.
